description: Thereâ€™s nothing quite like fresh bread with butter, made even better with this delicious red wine butter recipe. Or transform your cooking by giving your steak something special topping it with this smooth red wine butter with a hint of port.
name: Red Wine Butter Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Melt the first measure of butter (50g) in a saucepan and add chopped onion and garlic and cook over medium heat until tender.
Add wine, port and herbs and reduce until a medium syrup consistency. Then cool in the fridge for 20 minutes.
Place the onion mix in a processor and add the second measure of soft butter, mustard, second measure of port and pulse until well mixed.
Scrape onto plastic wrap or baking paper and roll into a tight log, twisting the ends of the wrap.
